de.intranda.digiverso.presentation.managedbeans

Class BrowseBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.intranda.digiverso.presentation.managedbeans.BrowseBean
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    @Named
 @SessionScoped
public class BrowseBean
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This bean provides the data for collection and term browsing.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        @Deprecated
public void calculateVisibleDcElements()
                                            throws IndexUnreachableException
        Deprecated. 
        Populates visibledcList with elements to be currently show in the UI. Prior to using this method, dcList must be sorted and each BrowseDcElement.hasSubElements must be set correctly.
